```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

source("neuralnet_model.R")


```

Loading data form the csv file

```{r}
filename <- "dsets/android_dataset_6_4.csv"
dataset <- read.csv(filename, header=TRUE, sep=",", row.names="Project")
dataset$Project <- NULL
```

Load our neuralnet model
```{r}
neuralnet <- neuralnet_model(dataset)
neuralnet <- fit(neuralnet, "neuralnet", dataset)
print(neuralnet)
```

Visualize neuralnet
```{r}
plot.nnet(neuralnet$m)
plot.nnet(trainedModels$neuralnet$m)
plot(trainedModels$neuralnet$m)
post(trainedModels$reg_tree$m, file = "./ptree.ps")
plot(trainedModels$lasso$m)
```

Predict result
```{r}
predictions <- m_predict(neuralnet, modelData)
print(predictions)
```
